name: Diceteria
description:
Grow dice bacteria in a Petri dish. The dice will roll themselves automatically.

Rolling a 1 will age the die, and rolling a 6 will create a new die.

You can buy new traits for a specified Petri dish, and any dice rolling the number will apply that effect.

Double click a dice in a Petri dish to save it to sell when the timer finishes.

CREDITS:

Ben Knobloch - Trait Concepts

Ben Kobrak - Art

David Van Hise - Programming

Graham Teller - Art

Jack Scherban - SFX

Thomas Ward - Music, SFX

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
